pages.text:
[TO BE PUBLISHED IN THE GAZETTE OF INDIA, EXTRAORDINARY, PART II,
SECTION 3, SUB-SECTION (i)]
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA
MINISTRY OF FINANCE
(DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE)
CORRIGENDUM
New Delhi, the 5th July, 2017
G.S.R. (E). – In the English version of the notification of the Government of India in
the Ministry of Finance (Department of Revenue), No. 8/2017-Integrated Tax (Rate), dated the
28th June, 2017 published in the Gazette of India, Extraordinary, Part II, Section 3, Sub-
section (i), vide number G.S.R. 683 (E), dated the 28th June, 2017, in the Table, in Sl No. 10,
in column (3) and column (4), for
(3) (4)
“(ii) Rental services of transport vehicles with or without operators, other
9”
than (i) above.
read
(3) (4)
“(ii) Rental services of transport vehicles with or without operators, other
18”
than (i) above.
[F. No. 334/1/2017 –TRU]
(Ruchi Bisht)
Under Secretary to the Government of India
